E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 2/21/1978
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Philadelphia!

Regards,
Danny Napoleon



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1978
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Pete Richert

fan interest increased!

Sincerly,
